title: around + related to: Xtech 2006
name: around + related to: Xtech 2006
description:
A Map by Jason

a place to dump info about interesting of relevent Places for attendees of xtech 2006 amsterdam

properties.name: ASCII - free technology squat, internet cafe
properties.description: Posted by Jason     Javastraat 38hs, East Amsterdam, NLFree squatter, hacker internet cafe, wifi, snacks, drinks and activism in many of the veins. This is the new location, just a bit east of Artis (the city zoo). HOURS: AS OF MAY 14TH 2006: # mo: closed # tu: 19.00-23.00, workshops # wed: 14.00-19.00 , after 19h, workshops # thu: 15:00 - 19:00, hackers lounge # fri: 16.00-24.00 # sat: 14.00-19.00 # sun: closed

properties.name: Aurora - Where to get foreign converters and stuff.
properties.description: Posted by JasonVijzelstraat, Amsterdam, NLHuge Radio Shack style place, near the Pathe\' Theatre. Closes early though. For computers you just need a shape shifter, you don\'t need an actual voltage converter, youru power supply should do that on it\'s own.

properties.name: Cafè Zool FREE WIFI in amsterdam
properties.description: Posted by Magneto465   AmsterdamSo i looked every where and asked a bunch of people about free wifi in amsterdam and the only place i found was, Cafè Zool. It\'s located on Oude Leliestraat 9

properties.name: Chill bike rental spot
properties.description: Posted by JasonDamrak, Amsterdam, NLif you want the unmarked, locals style bikes, this is the place to hit up.

properties.name: Fietsen Shop
properties.description: Posted by Jason  Weterignscaans, near \'sushi an\'Long body model with rain cover, color doesn\'t matter at all, get the disk brakes, get the luxury model, get the best one you can.

properties.name: Hotel Di-Ann
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor I stayed here when I first arrived in Amsterdam January 1994. We became friends and when I left, my name stayed behind. Thanks guys. While still a budget hotel, it is significantly nicer now. Stay there, eat candy, say hi!

properties.name: NH Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor Dam 9, Amsterdam , NLXTech will be here this year. Platial will be speaking as will Open Street Maps w00t. A welcome homecoming. Dam, 9 1012 JS Amsterdam Tel. +31.20.5549111 Fax. +31.20.6228607

properties.name: Super Tiny - Cafe Dolores
properties.description: Posted by Jason  Seating for 5, amazing chick pea veggie and meat burgers and some chi soda. NIEUWEZIJDS VOORBURGWAL T/O 289 AMSTERDAM TELEFOON: (020) 620 33 02

properties.name: Supermarket - Albert Hein
properties.description: Posted by Jason Dutch Grocery store, Doesn\'t take credit cards, you better weigh your produce before getting to the counter. This particular location is just teeming with junkies too, it\'s sad.

properties.name: Xtech 2006
properties.description: Posted by JasonGrand Hotel Krasnapolsky, Dam Square, Amsterdam, NLXTech 2006 is the premier European conference for developers, information designers and managers working with web and standards-based technologies. XTech brings together the worlds of web development, open source, semantic web and web standards. XTech 2006 will take place from 16-19 May in the heart of Amsterdam, at the Grand Hotel Krasnapolsky, Dam Square. The theme for 2006, "Building Web 2.0", recognises the key place of standards-based and open technology in enabling the next generation of web applications. Practitioners and leaders from all disciplines are invited to participate in presenting and discussing the technology and design issues behind the changing web. Building on the success of last year\'s conference, this year\'s tracks include: * Applications * Browser Technology * Core Technologies * Open Data Formerly known as the XML Europe conference, XTech has widened its scope to incorporate neighboring technologies from the web and business. As the use of XML broadens out beyond traditional core topics, we want to reflect that in the conference. As well as XML, XTech 2006 will cover web development, weblogging, search, the semantic web and more. You can keep up to date with the RSS feed

properties.name: centraal train station
properties.description: Posted by Jasonamsterdam, nlthis is where you will land in the city when you take the train from the airport. Look, you can walk down to the hotel if you didn\'t overpack :)
